displayBio.en: Wang Peng (born 1964, Jinan) graduated from the Mural Department of the Central Academy of Fine Art in 1988. He is known for his experimental artistic practice that encompasses installation, performance, video, and new media art. His personal experience is often the starting point for his creative process. He lives and works in New York and Beijing.
displayBio.zh-hant: 王蓬（1964年生於濟南，現於紐約及北京生活及工作），1988年畢業於中央美術學院壁畫系，其實驗藝術實踐涵蓋裝置、行為藝術、錄像、新媒體藝術等範疇。他的創作過程通常以自我經歷為起點。
